metatags.author: Produced by Digital Editors
metatags.og:title: Cruise Ships Are Legally Allowed to Dump Billions of Gallons of Raw Sewage in the Ocean
metatags.og:description: Where you'll find lots of people, you'll find lots of waste. That includes vast quantities of sewage. So where does it all go? Do cruise ships dump feces into the ocean? And do pleasure boats also dump poop? We take a look.

title: Marine debris - Wikipedia
snippet: Marine debris, also known as marine litter, is human-created waste that has deliberately or accidentally been released in a sea or ocean.
